DOC.detailed_description: Patients undergoing cardiac catheterization must meet clinical inclusion exclusion criterion sign inform consent . At time catheterization patient analyzed eligibility use angiographic inclusion exclusion criterion . Patients fulfil clinical angiographic criterion undergo image evaluation use IVUS RF catheter ( Volcano Therapeutics ) FFR wire ( Radi Volcano ) . The decision treatment lesion operator 's discretion . For patient enrol Washington Hospital Center undergo percutaneous coronary intervention , assessment non invasive perfusion adenosine MRI also perform .

Clinical indication coronary angiography stable unstable angina Specific Angiographic Patients require intermediate coronary lesion ( stenosis 4080 % visual estimate ) one native , major epicardial coronary artery reference diameter â‰¥2.5mm ( visual estimate ) The vessel ( ) intermediate lesion must flow limit lesion must available imaging must consider safe image evaluation . Patient document acute STsegment elevation myocardial infarction within past 24 hour Decompensated heart failure hypotension require intubation , inotropes , intravenous diuretic intraaortic balloon counterpulsation . Renal dysfunction ( creatinine clearance < 60 mL/min/1.73m2 ) Pregnancy breastfeed Standard contraindication MRI implant ferromagnetic device i.e . : pacemaker , defibrillator ( AICD ) , aneurysm clip Body weight > 400lbs Left ventricular hypertrophy > 1.5cm echocardiogram History bronchospasm asthma ECG evidence conduction defect , include 2nd 3rd degree AVB Patient know hypersensitivity , allergy contraindication gadoliniumbased contrast agent .
